content.detailedDescription:
During the launch of the discovery shuttle (sts-131) my mother and i observed two, white, streak-like objects flying in parallel without a contrail towards the south. they were not in any way associated with the rocket, and they were most definitely not rocket boosters.

my neighbor and i have seen these objects again on july 19th at around 8:00 pm. one was flying above the other and moving in a similar direction to the first sighting. i watched as the perspective on the object shifted from a cigar to a point on the horizon, indicating that it did indeed have shape and was moving.
content.summary: Two silent, white, streak-like objects heading in parallel direction.

content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing with a couple friends and my 2 sons on the beach. at about 10pm one of my friends jumped from his chair and yelled.. "did you see that, did you see that!" please tell me im not the only one that saw that". he told me he had just seen 2 bright orange lights high in the sky. they only stayed on for about 5 seconds and then just disappeared. our other friend also saw it but myself and my sons did not. i sat down in one of the other chairs and started to watch the sky. the moon was very bright and the beach and skies were fairly light. my 2 friends stood near their fishing poles. i had asked him where exactly they had seen the lights so i could focus my time on that area. they told me it was to the left of the moon and pointed to a star as reference.
it was about 5 minutes after that that i was setting there watching when all of a sudden 6 lights in a triangle shape came on. the lights were very very bright and orange. it was almost as if they were illuminating or glowing. they were pointed in my direction as if it were coming my way. i had yelled to my friends to look up in the sky. my one friend looked up and saw the lights and said it was almost exactly what he had seen a few minutes earlier only they were in a different part of the sky. they were to the left of the moon. then they just disappeared as quickly as they had appeared. im 100% positive that this was not any sort of conventional aircraft. it was almost surreal and seemed that it had changed locations from the first time it was seen. we sat there for the rest of the night (appx another 2 hrs) observing and hoping to get some photos. it did not make another appearance.
content.summary: Triangle shaped bright orange lights over the ocean.

content.detailedDescription:
On july 4th night at 10:30 pm my buddy (ron l.)and i
were watching the neughbor kids shooting off 
roman candles about 20 ft. in the air from my backyard.
we were looking skyward and saw a triangle (equilateral) craft
moving from se to ne and we lost sight after it passed the houses nearby. we had low cieling clouds 
at about 8000 to 9000 ft. we could see the outline 
of the craft against the clouds because the city
lights illuminated the clouds. the craft was black,
if there were no clouds one could not see the shape.
it also had a large golden light in the middle with
2 smaller gold colored lights toward the rear. there
was no sound no red or green navigation lights and 
no navigation strobe. i estimated the speed from when 
i used to watch jets land at san francisco airport.
thier approach speed was about 250 knots.
that night i could not sleep after seeing it.
i am retired from lockheed and worked on a lot of
classified projects and never saw anything like that.
content.summary: The craft was movig from se to ne at about 250 knots.

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke from a sleep to find small grey child like men at the foot of my bed..I couild not awake my husband russell....I tried to call for help but could not. then the small men ran from my room and climbed abourd their starship and headed for the skies.

i was able to move and when i woke russell he said he had a dream that little men were holding us down.
content.summary: Colors like my dreams..Red gold and green.

content.detailedDescription: I have been seeing them for five years
content.summary: Very brite as it fly by more than once.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my patio to the back yard to have a cigarret. i looked up  and seen what looked like a normal star. all of a sudden it went from (i am using these items as a scale of measuring) from the size of a pencil erasuer, grew to the size of a tennis ball, got really bright,then shrunk to nothing and dissapeared. i have never seen anything like that before and am curious as to what it could have been. any explaination as to what it could have been would be cool!.
content.summary: Looked like a star that grew big then shrunk to nothing.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i went outside on an evening in october in order to try and catch a glimpse of the international space station as it was supposed to be visible that night over lake erie. we were looking towards the sky over the lake which is north of our home. we didn't see the space station (as we found later that evening that we went out a day early according to the news reports), but we did see 'something' that we still cannot explain to this day. as we were looking overhead, there was a a boomerang-type shape that flew across the sky, heading north towards the lake. i cannot estimate how far away from the ground it was, but it was close enough to determine that it was not a plane or helicopter flying at such a low altitude (we do live near enough to cleveland hopkins airport and the metropolitan hospitals and are familiar with the types of aircraft in the area). it was a very quick, arched, fluid flight path. there was no noise, nor any lights. it's hard to explain, but it seemed to glow, but it wasn't lit up. it was like a grey contrast to the sky. it flew silently overhead heading towards the lake. we lost sight of it once it reached the treetops. we both asked one another if each had witnessed it and when we went back inside, we both drew what we thought we had seen and we drew the same shape. i don't know if this was a ufo or not, but we can honestly say we have never seen anything like it, nor have seen anything like it since.
content.summary: Went outside to see if we could see the international space station  as it was to be visible at this time.

content.detailedDescription:
I have very, very good eyes. i have spent the last 10 years or so watching air planes go by - it gets kinda boring just looking up at the sky. 

i was laying in the pool in the afternoon on tuesday and i heard a jet - from past experience i know that i can only hear them when they have gone directly over my house and are moving away. i looked for it and found it to be very different from anything that i have ever seen. it was cigar shaped and flying with the wide side moving forward - it also seemed to be moving much faster than 99% of the planes i have seen. it was tan in color and also had two red stripes about 10 to 20% from each end. i'm wondering if it was just a really short jet and the light made me only see the wings. i've seen a lot of tv programs about the cigar shaped aircraft, but not about what direction they fly.
content.summary: Cigar shaped jet with red stripes.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a hike with my dad and our friends. i was just taking scenic photos of the hills with my nikon coolpix l18 camera. a few minutes later i went to look at some of the pictures and this one caught my eye. it showed up yellow in the first second of viewing the image on my camera. the camera highlighed it for a second so it caught my eye and i zoomed into it. my friends said it might have been a helicopter landing pad in the hills but none of us saw it when we looked back. i just wanted to see if you know what it is for sure. thank you.
content.summary: Long silver or white cigar shape with black around the edges.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 1:00 a.M., i went outside and i saw a series (approximately 15) of glowing red orbs that appeared as if they were coming up from the ground in a wooded area in stahlstown.  it seemed like they were duplicating near the ground in the wooded area.  they then floated in formation about 1,000 ft. (approx.) above and over my home (from north to southwest).  they made no noise, no flashing lights, just huge, glowing red orbs (like the photo of the illinois sighting on that same date).  after they passed over the home silently, they seemed to go up into the atmosphere and they disappeared.  i have never seen anything like this in my life!  i then found out that there were other sightings in westmoreland county (near irwin) on that same date.  i had no camera or binoculars on me as i wasn't expecting to see such a thing.  it was definitely "not of this world"...I wouldn't have been a believer of ufo's until i saw it myself.  once i started investigating it further, i am 100% convinced that i am seeing what others saw.  the photo that best describes what i viewed (in awe!!) was the photo posted on this website from the illinois sighting that same evening.  i'm a believer now!  i try to stay outside each evening to see if i see any further sightings.  i live in an isolated area where i have an excellent view of both the northern and western sky.
content.summary: A series of large red glowing spheres or discs floating over my home

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from a friends house and the sky looked particularly cool tonight with the cloud formations present.  i stopped at home, and normally i would just get out of the car and head inside but something stopped me and i just looked at the moon, adoring it, when i noticed what seemed to be a constellation of 4 or 5 "stars" directly under the moon, which i had never noticed before.  i focused on them and as i was looking they seemed to get "closer", or "bigger", and moved around a little bit.  i had the feeling inside that i was witnessing something amazing, almost to the point of crying.  they eventually faded away to the point where i couldn't see them anymore, just the moon.  what were they and where did they go?  they were not really bright, in comparison to say... jet lights or plane lights, but they were putting off some form of light.
content.summary: Four "stars" near the moon that got slightly closer and brighter then faded away

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a us airways flight returning from the illinois.  i am not sure where over az we were but, the plane was over arizona as we were preparing for landing. my guess some where in ne az would be the most likley route from illinois.  anyway, i was looking out the window ( i usually request window seat) as i like to do as i love to fly.  the view is absoluteley amazing.  so, i was looking out the window when i first noticed the object flying close to the plane.  i was surprised to see something that close to a airplane in flight.  i could not take my eyes off of it until i could not see it throught the window anymore.  it moved across the sky just below the plane and off the right side moving in a straight line from the front of the plane to the rear along the right side of it.  at first i thought another plane was flying by but, i quickly realized that was not another plane. it was a round ball shaped object.  i saw the object for about 5-10 seconds but it seemed a little longer.  almost like time slowed but, i know it could not have happened.  now, i realize the plane i am in is flying approx 3-600 miles per hour but, the object appeared to either be stationary or about the same speed.  i am not exactly sure.  the object was a shiney metallic ball shaped object.  i did not see any engine or windows in the traditional sense but, it was in the air and i could clearly see the object.  the object was very shiney silver metallic. looking at the object i could not see any sheet metal or rivets or any other markings that might identify it.  it just looked like one solid object.  it looked like it could have been the approximate size of a vehicle. perhaps the size of a suv.  i am not sure how close it was to the plane but, it appeared to be very close maybe a 100 or 200 yards from the plane maybe less.  i cannot be sure as i am not a expert in distances in the air but, it was definetely close.  
when the object had left my view from the plane window i looked to the two people sitting next to me and asked if they saw anything.  neither did. i just sat there tyring to figure out what i just happened.  then the plane landed. i got off and went home.
content.summary: Round metalic object flew by airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
On july 21 my friend called my cell phone at 9:47, and said: "you won't beleive it but i'm seeing what i'm seeing. there's a huge black triangle with lights on its sides about half mile away from me, about the size of football field, just hovering in the air". he doesn't beleive in anything, so it was not like him to make it up. after i said that he's joking etc, i asked him a few questions. he seemed pretty shocked and sounded very unusual. 
so from the information i got from him, it was a black triangle the size of football field, not moving or making any sound, about as high up in the air as a hospital helicopter would fly. there was no light on the bottom ( i asked if there was after looking at pictures online), just the 3 lights on the sides. it was about 20 feet thick. 

he've never heard about a ufo of this kind. tried taking a picture but it was too dark and too far. he was also running late for work so didn't stop to watch what is going to happend, just drove by it. he said he was looking at it as was talking to me on the cell phone.

to add to the describtion, he said it wasnt really all black. it was more like metal, he could see shades on the sides. but it was still dark.
he's still pretty shocked and doesn't want to talk about it much, and havn't told many people about what he saw.
content.summary: My friend was driving to work and called me as he saw it hovering over the field.

content.detailedDescription: I left work heading south on 99. i was trying to hurry home since there was a tornado spotted on 94 heading east to the albion area, which was about 10 miles from where i work. the clouds were very scary and low. the rain slowly subsided by the time i got home but the tornando sirens were going off. i watched the news for a few minutes and decided it was clearing up enough to finally get some pictures of the clouds moving out of the area. in one of the pictures i notice a strange boomerang shaped object. it was strange and haven't seen anything like it before. i attached a picture to share...
content.summary: Taking pictures of storm clouds and saw boomerang object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
well the first time i seen one of the objects i was about 15 or so and these paticular craftes are spherical balls of light possibly a disc thats actually emitting light its hard to tell. the las time was about a month ago i was driving north on m 52 when i spotted it. it was a solid ball of light not like a plane which has individual flashing lights. we tryed to pursue the object but it was flying just above the trees and it seems to manuver almost perfectly for being so close to the trees. it was about 35 to 40 ft wide and about 10 feet high. we managed to keep up but it shot at least 10 miles ahead of us in a matter of seconds. no afterburner and no sound.It was gone so fast after traveling so slow over the trees.
      the most extreme encounter i had was in 1999. a friend and i were about 5 miles from the most recent sighting . we were on sylvan road in manchester mi. we were heading south down a winding hill and we could see bright lights in the distance maybe a half a mile ahead. they we on the left side of the road and as we got closer i realized they were coming from the sky. at first i thought helicopters but the lights were to close together. when we got within 500 feet i realized it was actually a ufo scanning the woods for something but as we approached the lights went off and the craft shot verically into the sky.It was about 300ft long with huge spotlights on the bottom. we have also seen huge triangle shaped crafts. along with strange military planes who also seem to be searching 4 something.
content.summary: Not out of the ordinary i been seeing these things for the past 15 years.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from my boyfriends house and i saw some dots in my view, they catched my eye as they were bright red. i kept driving as these dots got bigger, there was about five of them. as i went up the hill (as i live on a very steep hill), these dots turned into circles to the left of me. i couldnt take my eyes of them. they seemed to be moving not too fast but quite quickly.

i stoped the car in confusion, locked my doors and looked up. then it went from five circles to two. 
i did think i was just been silly and was thinking of all these other things it could have been, but it couldnt have been anything else.

i like to think there is something out there, hopefully nice and kind haha. there are billions of things we don't know about this world. i would love to know, but for some reason its all a secret to us!!!

i stayed there for about a min then drove of fast as i got scared on my own. got home and the whole family were laughing at me, i dont care because i know what i saw that night.
it could have been something or nothing. :)
content.summary: Bright red circles.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear people,
                     ufo sighting, looking for evidence, can you help? 
 
              date;   11/ 9/ 2004 saterday,
              
             time; between six thirty to eight thirty in the morning
   
            place; england, burghfield, reading, berkshire.Postcode rg30 3tg
 
           lat  51; 24; 40n ( 51.41116)
 
          long 1;02;26w  ( -1,04053)
 
 someone somewhere got this evidence on vidieo is it you?
any webb cams on this area? any radar evidence? any weather cams?
any google earth cams? anyone got any ideas where else to look?
 
 thanks for your help,
 michael,
 
1 going home
2 size sky was light blue no clouds anywhere in sky stuck out 
3 spaceship nearly crashed van asked wife what she 4rt it was said same
4 coloured lights trough middle clouds rushing through it no noise hovering 
5 frightened scared at first then tried to collect as much information in my head about sighting
6 it moved off quickly into the sky lost sight of it after 3 miles
content.summary: Huge cloudy coulour.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at grapevine lake to take some sunset photos on may 30, around 8:20.  i didn't see anything with the naked eye, but later when i got home, i noticed what looks like a shooting star or comet.  there is nothing in the first picture, then the next it looks like one is coming straight down and another going across towards the sun, north to south.  the one coming straight down disappears and there is only the one larger one in better view.  it wasn't a quick streak and then gone...It moved slowly in my opinion and it is definitely not a plane.  i have a series of at least 10 to 15 pics from beginning to see it until it it cross over the sun and gets distant and i quit taking the pics.  

i sent the photos to the local weather guy, and he said it was nothing he'd seen and it wasn't a comet or shooting star, and he said it was a ufo, to contact the national weather site. i did and they said it was nothing they could identify and to contact you.  

i am uploading the first picture where you can see the 2, with are in the upper to mid right side of the photo...Above the shelter roof and the better of the 2 pics middle and ending.  i can send more photos if you are interested.  i am curious to see what you think.  it's not a plane and it is long, no wings or tail. the photos are not on a long exposure at all, it bracketed the light on some...One i made b & w to see better.
content.summary: Taking pics, sunset at lake grapevine, didn't see anything with eyes, but after looking at pics later, saw what looked like comet, but weather guy said it wasn't and said it was a ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was on a short vacation trip in the state of veracruz and on sunday 14 march 2010 i went to the hotel���s roof (in the city of cordoba) and took pictures of the volcano named pico de orizaba wich is many miles away. later that day reviewing the photos a friend of mine and i saw this ufo over the volcano. this object appears in 3 of the photos. the camera is a panasonic lumix model dmc-tz5. i must say that i never saw the object until reviewing the pictures. i asume that the ufo moved fastly because in a one minute lapse it flew a long distance in a strange trajectory (indicated in one of the photos).
content.summary: Ufo over pico de orizaba volcano

content.detailedDescription: I stood at my back door of the house to have a smoke before i retired. i was star gazing on a cold clear night. for several seconds i was looking up and there was nothing to see but stars.All of a sudden it became clear that the sky above me wasnt stars and blackness but a craft.It looked as though it had cloaked into the background and was only visible when it moved slowly above me and the stars in the rest of the sky were fixed. there was no way for me to determin the hight it was at.I moved out onto the decking to follow its flight from south to north over my house and it excelorated from a slow speed to lightening fast in a second and vanished.There was no engin sound. only the sound of a large mass moving through the air.
content.summary: The sky initialy looked clear with stars clearly shining. only when the object moved did it become visible.

content.detailedDescription: Et's = 1 , humans = 0 , hah !
content.summary: Beautifully slow & low, many seen it too, more crafts within the photo.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on the porch of a friend's home, 6 of us witnesses a bright light zig zagging whilst travelling east to west over phelan.  as the object traveled over head we could clearly see it was a triangle shape with orange lights at each corner of the triangle and in the center of the triangle.  the object made absolutely no noise.

we watched it as it continued in a westerly direction and out of site.
content.summary: Triangle shape ufo with orange lights.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting outside with friends. we were facing south towards the mazatzals. we saw a low flying green fireball with a tail move quickly in a downward angle moving from east to west. unfortunately, our friends had their backs to the event. we stammered, trying to say something to them, but couldn't articulate fast enough. it was quick, maybe 3 seconds in duration. it didn't seem to originate too far up from the ridge across from our house; it was like a meteor, but extremely bright even with a fairly bright moon and distinctly bright green.  the color and brightness is what caught our attention. the green fireball went behind the ridge to our south. my initial reaction was to brace for an impact, the way you might imagine in a movie, a boom and cloud of dust.  as i attempted to describe it to our friends, the hair on my arms came up. i stood and watched the sky where the event happened and saw the blinking lights of a low flying helicopter not too long afterwards. about 15 minutes after the event my son and i drove not too far down a back road hoping to see something. only lightning in the distance. when we got home, i googled "low flying green fireball in the sky" and looked at the wikipedia entry. i showed my wife the artist's rendition of the green fireball. she remarked, "that's it."
content.summary: Green fireball.

content.detailedDescription: Outside my backyard i saw what i thought was venus but its not visible as its on the other side of the planet now,its still there now.Solid white light no pulsation or fluctuation,small movements in all directions,no discernable pattern,almost looks like 'pilot" is drunk?,not fast.Planes flew overhead closer to me,hard to say but it looks like its at a similar height but many miles to the south east.Not sure if related to event but kept thinking the trees and rooftops were being illuminated but as i took focus of object effect disappeard.Just looked back and it has risen a few degrees in the sky.Checked star charts nothing was noted of anything in its position.I'm sending this now in hopes someone gets in time to see it,will continue observation
content.summary: Looks like venus.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working on a privacy fence in my yard in cross plains. i stepped on a step ladder to cut off the top of a post, and something in the sky caught my attention.I saw orange colored lights in the southeastern sky. there were three or four.I was squinting and trying to focus, on what i was seeing. they were disappearing and popping back up.I stuttered to the three people working with me, to look at the lights. i told my wife to go get a camera, but we just stood staring thinking they would vanish if we stopped looking. there were three at one time i remember, and they were in a triangular shape, far from each other. each one would have two more lights flip on beside it, making three lights in a horizontal line. we watched them for about fifteen minutes and they were gone. i predict it was between eight and nine pm., because the sky was that darker blue color right before nightfall.
we were just about to call it a day, when we noticed the lights. i have heard people talk about these same lights, mostly seen out of sabanno/pioneer in between cross plains and rising star, for the past decade now. seen time and time again. some people seeing them three times or more over the years. i have seen these same type of lights on youtube.I never thought they were making it up. i just never could buy into it, until i seen it with my own eyes. i seen where somebody reported seeing it driving on 183 near brownwood and got out of the car and watched it.
content.summary: Seen orange colored lights in the sky southeast of cross plains, tx.  07-19-2010.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting outside smokeing and talking when a friend of mine told me to turn around there was something in the shy moving left then right but still flying in a n.W. direction.As it got closer to us it was pulsating (not flashing)a electric green color,we watched in amazement as it moved in very strange movements.We stood and watched it as it passed right over our heads,while still moving left to right but coming back to the path it was on.The strange part is it had no sound and was in no hurry,as low as it was we should of heard something,im guessing it couldnt of been more than 200 feet over us.The shape was the shape of a triangle with one of the points cut off with 2 green lights on each side.We watched it till it was out of sight.It was moving slower than anything ive ever seen in the air.The strange part of the night was right after it went threw a jet left clinton field and was well below flight deck and could see the exhaust from the engines at night in the dark.We were discussing it when a few other people came up and said they had never seen one like it befor but there has been to many to count in the last 3 to 4 weeks.When you see something like this it makes you pay attention,and if you dont believe it will change your way of thinking.
content.summary: Was outside smoking and talking with friends when a light appeared pulsating green as it flew over head it had no noise and was only about 200 feet above us.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on cv road by the madison, wi airport.  as i was driving northboud i saw a boomerang bright shiny object (a single object) "appear" immediately in front of my line of sight.  i blinked, thinking it might have been something in my eye (i was wearing sunglasses).  after blinking the object was no longer there.  then once i finished the "curve" in cv and headed north...Two objects of the same type appeared.  as i looked out the window of the car window, they appeared immediately as i looked through the window.  the two objects appeared and were visible for about 5 seconds and then just vanished.  

this experience was very weird for me.  i am an educated person (two bs degrees and a masters).  it took me a while after the incident to consider reporting this....But something was there for those brief seconds.  i saw the first object and then, later, the other two for just those brief seconds.  it was not an airplane (given that i was driving by the madison airport), it was something else.
content.summary: Like a boomerang, silver, bright.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a brite lite in the sky @ around 9pm july,7 2010 while my friend & i were on our way back from town.I continued @ watch it as we were stopping by my father inlaws house upon pulling out of the drive way i noticed it was still there. my girl friend didnt notice it untill we got on loblolly rd were she had decided 2 pull over & start taking pictures on her cell phone camera. we continued 2 watch it all the way home when we arrived i got my camera out & started taking pictures atfer i took like 33 pics i went inside 2 see what i got i have a pic of a craft that looks like it was flying right @ me i also have side view of that same craft. i continued 2 go outside periodicaly an taking more pics each time this went on till i went 2 bed.All the pics i took that nite the object was always a differant shape & brite ness. i now have about 200 pics on my camera & about 50 or more of them have something in them.I am continueing 2 take pictures 4 as long as i can i was just out a few minutes ago & got more pics my sithing is still on going & its not an every nite occurence but it has been pretty regular since that first nite.I have been trying 2 contact your organization by phone because i am computer illiterite,& i would like 4 someone 2 return my calls so i can get my story out there. i cant send u pics because i dont know how im suprisied i got this far.I know that wat i saw was real cause i didnt have any idea of what it could be untill i saw my pictures & they speek 4 themselves & they are quite amazing & i think u all will be very astonished when u can see them 4 yourselves.                                                                                                                                                                                   sincerly,wendy kastner
content.shape: Boomerang,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: I was on my way home from town, when i saw a brite lite in the sky i watched it 4 awhile when friend had noticed it she pulled over 2 take some pictures then we continued home.

content.detailedDescription:
At 1h00 am a golden star vertically went up in the sky.
at 3h00 am quickly but sweetly moved horizontally
then slowly diagonally went up to south until the sunrise....
content.summary: Eastern and south golden star.

content.detailedDescription:
A poem about the real area 51

in the desert there are trees that grow with tops of
sand to hide a road, a road where there live 5 boy clones.
each boy has the same 5 dads they ride around in a black van!
when they speak it's in your head, they speak of telepathic dread.

by a remote viewer
content.summary: Area 51.
